Text: OTCOFFICE IS YOUR COMPLIMENTARY OFFICE DURING OTC Dear OTC Participant Below is some information on Regus which may be of interest to you as well as your client An instant complimentary office in downtown Houston for OTC participants from until instantly based on availability Everyone is working under tight deadline Take advantage of our complimentary services while you are away from your home office We are jus t minutes away from the astrodome Regus Business Centers Simply walk in sit down and start work Regus is changing the way people work by providing instant offices on short term flexible leases Our business Centres are fully furnished staffed an d equipped with leading edge technology tailormade to suit your changing business needs You can upsize downsize or relocate completelyin an instant TwoAllen Center Smith St Ste Houston TX The new Regus Business Centre located at Smith Street in the Two Allen Center provides a range of services capable of accommodating all of your office needs Furnished and equipped offices and team rooms people Receptionist to meet and greet your visitors Conferencemeetingtrainingvideoconferencing facilities Complimentary Administrativebusiness support services including faxin g printing message servicing secretarial services etc Latest telecommunications including ISDN and T internet access Do some great networking while you enjoy a complimentary cup of coffee or cappuccino in our Cyber Caf while checking your email The above is brought to you by Regus Business Centers and Global Trade Days Email Go to wwwglobaltradedayscom for a list of several thousand of last year OTC exhibitors and attendees click on Offshore which will be a great too l for this years networking Sincerely Jodi Barraclough Regus Business Centers Fax wwwreguscom
